item.title: test
item.description: School Notes Communication Notes La Communication! Fundamentals of Public Speaking Fundamentals of Public Speaking Notes: Good questions to ask yourself: How are you feeling today? What are the causes for that feeling? Why does that cause what you are feeling? The Four Types of Speeches: 1. Manuscript (written out word for word) - Pros: - You know what you'll say; - Timing is perfect; - No eye contact; - Cons: - You'll sound robotic; - Losing your place is very bad; - No eye contact; 1.
